gacha.recovery_tips: You can exchange your Duplicate cards for Gacha Tickets in 【Recycle】
gacha.rule1: Daily login to get 6 tickets automatically;
gacha.rule2: Continuously login 2 days for 1 bonus ticket, continuously login 3 days or above for 2 bonus tickets;
gacha.rule3: Continuously login 10 days for bonus 10 tickets;
gacha.rule5: Reward will be refresh at 00:00 (GMT+8) everyday.
gacha.share_tip: Share for the 1st time today, Gacha Ticket +1

report.comic_tip: Share QRcode to your friends and see what Manga Names they will get!
report.coupon_tip: Invite 1 friend to finish reading your annual report, you will get Gacha Tickets*10, maximum 3 times a day. (Please note that each friend can only be invited once only. Friends who finished report cannot be invited.)
report.nodata_nuser: {name} You have no record, but your journey in QooApp is about to begin…
report.nodata_ouser: You finally remember QooApp at the end of year, looking forward to hearing about your Qoo stuff in 2023~~
report.p10_c1_s1: You gained a total of {total} gacha tickets, and they all came from daily login reward.
report.p10_c1_s2: Your next line is……What are gacha tickets?
report.p10_c2_s1: You gained a total of {total} gacha tickets,
report.p10_c2_s4: The best things in life are free.
report.p11_c1_s1: You spent {total} gacha tickets in QooApp Gacha Pool this year...
report.p11_c1_s2: and collected {total} different gacha cards.
report.p11_c1_s3: You almost completed the gallery! Would anybody else be able to do this?
report.p11_c2_s1: Do you remember how many gacha tickets have you used in your life? We do.
report.p11_c3_s1: You never pulled any QooApp Gacha in 2022.
report.p12_c1_s1: This year you received {total} Likes, but did not give any.
report.p12_c1_s2: "Notes can have my Likes, when it earns my Likes……"
report.p12_c2_s1: This year you gave {total} Likes, but did not receive any.
report.p12_c2_s2: "I’ll give you my Likes, in exchange...show me your dreams."
report.p12_c3_s1: This year you received {liker} Likes, and gave {likeg} Likes.
report.p12_c3_s2: Did someone just use Likes to attack your village? Hit them back with your Likes.
report.p13_c1_s1: These 3 otaQoos interacted with you the most:
report.p13_c1_s2: "I’m not afraid of anything anymore. Because I’m not alone anymore."
report.p13_c2_s1: These 2 otaQoos interacted with you the most:
report.p13_c2_s2: "Who said I don't have any friends? My friends are real!"
report.p13_c3_s1: You only interacted with one otaQoo:
report.p13_c3_s2: How rude, this is pure love.
report.p13_c4_s2: This is your Bocchi the Rock.
report.p2_c1_s1: {m}/{d} is the first day we met!
report.p2_c1_s2: Lots of exciting games captivate your attention. You Are Filled With Determination.
report.p2_c2_s1: Hmm...when is your last time using QooApp?
report.p2_c3_s1: Let's celebrate Mr.Qoo's birthday again next year!
report.p2_c5_s1: Never too late to meet you! Which games are you looking forward in 2023?
report.p3_c1_s1: You have visited QooApp {day} days this year!
report.p3_c2_s1: Wow! You visit QooApp everyday this year! Thank you!
report.p3_c3_s2: Hmm...Let Mr.Qoo make a guess...You only think of QooApp when you got a game update, right?
report.p3_c4_s1: You have login {day} days in a row in between.
report.p3_c4_s2: Thank you for coming regularly! Hope you find something fun and interesting everytime!
report.p4_c1_s1: In 2022, you downloaded {total} games in total!
report.p4_c1_s2: 《{name}》 is your first downloaded game.
report.p4_c1_s3: Is it still in your phone?
report.p4_c2_s1: Wow! You didn't download any new games!
report.p4_c2_s2:
Guess there are a couple of your favorite in your phone. 
Which are they?
report.p7_c1_s2: "Shush! Be quiet! Don't bother me playing games!"
report.p8_c1_s1: In 2022, you haven't used the servant's translation.
report.p8_c1_s2: "Since when were you under the impression that I am fluent in Japanese? I actually just skipped all the dialogues..."
report.p8_c2_s1: In 2022, you have used the servant's translation {total} times.
report.p8_c2_s2: The servants used Translation Gummy on you. Super Effective!
report.p9_c1_s1: In 2022, you received a total of {total} Avatar Frames, all of them were given by Mr.Qoo.
report.p9_c1_s2: We all have that one friend who needs to learn how to get Avatar Frames.
report.p9_c2_s1: In 2022, you received a total of {total} Avatar Frames in 2022
report.p9_c2_s2: {total} of them were given by Mr.Qoo,
report.p9_c2_s3: You earned {total} of them from participating events.
report.p9_c3_s1: {total} of them came from your wallet.
report.p9_c3_s2: You received a total of {total} Avatar Frames given by Mr.Qoo,
report.p9_c4_s1: Your money is not gone. You simply swapped it for the Avatar Frames you love.
